resources.string:
Care2Reuse is a non-profit social network that allows everyone to improve its environmental and social footprint

C2R promotes reuse as the second most desirable waste management option (after waste prevention), by connecting people that want to get of reusable things with people that want them 

C2R aims at leveraging the importance of reuse, building the first environment-oriented social 

To know more, visit the Care2Reuse page
